meanings.definition: To involve or include mutually or reciprocally.
meanings.sent1: Working together interinvolves sharing ideas and responsibilities.
meanings.sent2: The success of the project interinvolves the efforts of the entire team.
meanings.sent3: The friendship between the two interinvolves trust and loyalty.
meanings.sent4: Their destinies interinvolves like threads woven into a tapestry.
meanings.sent5: The dance interinvolves graceful movements and precise timing.

meanings.definition: To involve or include in a complex or intricate way.
meanings.sent1: The mystery novel interinvolves multiple plot twists and characters.
meanings.sent2: The new technology interinvolves various components to function properly.
meanings.sent3: The recipe interinvolves precise measurements and cooking techniques.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork interinvolves vibrant colors and intricate patterns.
meanings.sent5: The puzzle interinvolves solving clues to reveal the hidden message.
